That would be good and could then have him being cast out of the family and then the little brother drug and tie his sister to there beds in his room, invite the friend over thinking they are still there for him. ... This is what you call a FORCED NTR. Because, throughout the whole, there was absolutely no mention of the kid brother being the least bit attracted to his older sisters, but now, all of a sudden, he wants to fuck them?  Now those two have no problem showing themselves fucking his 'best friend' when they went all of their way, during the whole series, to hide it from him? Serious question here: does the author know the difference between 'sister' and 'girlfriend'? Reading this, I don't think he does! Anyway, overall, this was a series full of great drawings, but with one of the dumbest premise imaginable. Honestly, there should be an epilogue to this whole thing, where the brother comes back to make it very clear that he doesn't care who's fucking his sisters... 'cause he shouldn't care.
lesson we got from here "don't trust your friend who come to get nice to you because they have ulterior motive"

Oh. That was a pretty good ending. I kinda wish it didn't turn into an 8 chapter series because it really feels like the story got stretched out a lot. Overall, I really enjoyed how they got corrupted.
